com.googlecode.cqengine.attribute

Class ReflectiveAttribute<O,A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.cqengine.attribute.impl.AbstractAttribute<O,A>
      • com.googlecode.cqengine.attribute.SimpleAttribute<O,A>
        • com.googlecode.cqengine.attribute.ReflectiveAttribute<O,A>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attribute<O,A>

    public class ReflectiveAttribute<O,A>
extends SimpleAttribute<O,A>
    A type of SimpleAttribute which is implemented using reflection.

    This type of attribute will not perform as well as an attribute defined in code, but this type can sometimes be convenient.

    Author:
    Niall Gallagher

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReflectiveAttribute(Class<O> objectType, Class<A> fieldType, String fieldName)
      Creates an attribute which reads values from the field indicated using reflection.
